install.name: Latest news from www.joomlatools.eu - admin module
install.author: Joomlatools
install.copyright: This template is released under the GNU/GPL License
install.description: Shows the latest news headers from DOCman

param.name: feed_url
param.label: Feed URL
param.description: The URL of the feed (leave blank for default)

param.name: limit
param.label: Limit
param.description: The number of items to display per channel (default 5)

param.name: cachetime
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The cache time in seconds (default 86400s = 24 hours)
